sourcesContent:
import React , {useEffect , useState} from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import {useParams} from 'react-router-dom' const SingleCourse = ({ showModal, handleClose , selectedCourseId }) => { const [course , setCourse] = useState([]) const { id } = useParams() useEffect(() => { axios.get(`http://localhost:5000/course/course/${selectedCourseId}`) .then(res => { console.log(res.data) setCourse(res.data) }) .catch(err => console.log(err)) }, []) return (
Course Details

ID : {course.id}

Name : {course.name}

Description : {course.description}

Category_id : {course.category_id}

Status : {course.status}

Teacher : {course.teacher}

Video_link : {course.video_link}

) } export default SingleCourse
